amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Internet Crimes Against Children Task Forces by $3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to revise the amount made available for "Office of Justice Programs--Justice Assistance" and reducing the amount made available for "Department of Justice--General Administration--Salaries and Expenses", by $3 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
